languages.text: {n}Каждая конечность существа — и твердые, на скелетных лапах, и гибкие, на металлизированных шлангах, — снабжены разнообразными инструментами, схожими с хирургическими. Зазубренные дисковые пилы, витые дрели и моноскальпели обещают нестерпимую боль.{/n}

{n}Every limb of the creature, the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise unbearable pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каждая конечность существа — и твердые, на скелетных лапах, и гибкие, на металлизированных шлангах, — снабжены разнообразными инструментами, схожими с хирургическими. Зазубренные дисковые пилы, витые дрели и моноскальпели обещают нестерпимую боль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Every limb of the creature, both the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to the surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills and vibrating monoscalpels promise an unbearable pain.{/n}

{n}Every limb of the creature, both the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to the surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills and vibrating monoscalpels promise an unbearable pain.{/n}

{n}Every limb of the creature, both the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to the surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise an unbearable pain.{/n}

{n}Every limb of the creature, both the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to the surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise an unbearable pain.{/n}

{n}Every limb of the creature, the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise unbearable pain.{/n}

{n}Every limb of the creature, the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise unbearable pain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}生き物の全四肢には、骨格の足の硬い部分と金属のコードでできた柔軟な部分があり、手術器具に似たさまざまな器具が装備されている。ギザギザの丸鋸、ねじれたドリル、振動するモノメスは、耐え難い痛みをもたらす。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every limb of the creature, the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生き物の全四肢には、骨格の足の硬い部分と金属のコードでできた柔軟な部分があり、手術器具に似たさまざまな器具が装備されている。ギザギザの丸鋸、ねじれたドリル、振動するモノメスは、耐え難い痛みをもたらす。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只机械生物的每条肢体，无论是外骨骼爪子上的利爪，还是金属索连接的柔软部分，都配备着各种各样的工具，看起来是用来进行外科手术的。锯齿状的圆锯、扭曲的钻头与振动的单分子手术刀，都预示着会带来难以忍受的痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every limb of the creature, the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只机械生物的每条肢体，无论是外骨骼爪子上的利爪，还是金属索连接的柔软部分，都配备着各种各样的工具，看起来是用来进行外科手术的。锯齿状的圆锯、扭曲的钻头与振动的单分子手术刀，都预示着会带来难以忍受的痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cada extremidad de la criatura, tanto las duras, sobre patas esqueléticas, como las más flexibles, sobre cuerdas metálicas, está equipada con una variedad de implementos similares a las herramientas quirúrgicas. Las sierras circulares dentadas, las perforadoras y los monoescalpelos prometen un dolor insoportable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every limb of the creature, the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cada extremidad de la criatura, tanto las duras, sobre patas esqueléticas, como las más flexibles, sobre cuerdas metálicas, está equipada con una variedad de implementos similares a las herramientas quirúrgicas. Las sierras circulares dentadas, las perforadoras y los monoescalpelos prometen un dolor insoportable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jedes Glied der Kreatur, sowohl die festen auf skelettalen Pfoten als auch die flexiblen an metallenen Schnüren, ist mit einer Vielzahl von Werkzeugen ausgestattet, die an chirurgisches Besteck erinnern. Die gezackten Kreissägen, gewundenen Bohrer und vibrierenden Monoskalpelle versprechen unerträgliche Schmerzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every limb of the creature, the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jedes Glied der Kreatur, sowohl die festen auf skelettalen Pfoten als auch die flexiblen an metallenen Schnüren, ist mit einer Vielzahl von Werkzeugen ausgestattet, die an chirurgisches Besteck erinnern. Die gezackten Kreissägen, gewundenen Bohrer und vibrierenden Monoskalpelle versprechen unerträgliche Schmerzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Chaque membre de la créature, aussi bien les appendices rigides fixés sur ses pattes squelettiques que ceux plus flexibles faits de câbles métalliques, est équipé d'une variété d'instruments semblables à des outils chirurgicaux. Les nombreuses scies circulaires dentées, perceuses et monoscalpels vibratoires promettent mille souffrances à quiconque aurait la mauvaise idée de contrarier le monstre mécanique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every limb of the creature, the hard ones on skeletal paws and the flexible ones on metallic cords, is equipped with a variety of implements similar to surgical tools. The jagged circular saws, twisted drills, and vibrating monoscalpels promise unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaque membre de la créature, aussi bien les appendices rigides fixés sur ses pattes squelettiques que ceux plus flexibles faits de câbles métalliques, est équipé d'une variété d'instruments semblables à des outils chirurgicaux. Les nombreuses scies circulaires dentées, perceuses et monoscalpels vibratoires promettent mille souffrances à quiconque aurait la mauvaise idée de contrarier le monstre mécanique.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kemiksi pençelerindeki sert olanlardan, metalik kordonlardaki esnek olanlara, yaratığın bütün uzuvlarına, cerrahi gereçlere benzer çeşitli eklentiler takılmış. Tırtıklı daire testereler, bükümlü matkaplar ve titreyen mononeşterler, ölçüsüz bir acı vadediyor.{/n}
